page.title: 03Shopping
page.content: In our area a new Asda hypermarket has opened. It is very popular because it offers free parking and a large variety of goods at low prices. Previously most people shopped at the Arndale Shopping Centre and although it is still popular it is not as busy as Asda. Over the last twenty years a lot of small shops have suffered loss of trade because they cannot compete Asda has late shopping evenings, a play area and its own petrol station. However, many have survived because they offer personal service. Bare still has a busy main street with a variety of shops which are popular with residents and visitors. Although they have had to change they are still an important part of the community. Shopping habits have changed over the years. Shopping is often a weekly outing for the whole family.
